instructions: Open Pok mon Masters on your phone. From the home screen select team in the bottom right corner. From the list, select Moves and Skills . Tap the move you wish to learn . Note the amount of Training eqiupment it needs to learn. Tap the big yellow learn button. When asked if you want to use the training equipment required, tap yes . You will see a splash screen saying you succeeded. Your new move will now be highlighted the same color as your other learned moves.
